Text: Inside Bad Company 1974–1982:  The DVD covers the band in the 1970s, 1980s of the original line up of Paul Rodgers, Mick Ralphs, Boz Burrell and Simon Kirke.

Text: Inside Bad Company 1974–1982:  The documentary has interview segments with Kirke, (the only member to be with the band for its entire history) and has instrumental demonstrations showing how the songs were written and played.
